# iosxr_tftp_client (Data Source)

This data source can read the TFTP Client configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_tftp_client" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `client_vrfs` (Attributes List) VRF name for TFTP service (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--client_vrfs))
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.

<a id="nestedatt--client_vrfs"></a>
### Nested Schema for `client_vrfs`

Read-Only:

- `dscp` (String) Set IP DSCP (DiffServ CodePoint) for TFTP Client Packets
- `retries` (Number) Specify the number of retries when client requests TFTP connections
- `source_interface` (String) Specify interface for source address in TFTP connections
- `timeout` (Number) Specify the timeout for every TFTP connection in seconds
- `vrf_name` (String) VRF name for TFTP service
